title: Subject Guides: Directory of Data Sets for Health Management: Home
author: Liberty McCoy
description: A Directory of datasets for download for Health Management students.
cleaned_text: and Aging Project](http://www.norc.org/Research/Projects/Pages/national-social-life-health-and-aging-project.aspx) The National Social Life, Health, and Aging Project (NSHAP) is a longitudinal, population-based study of health and social factors, aiming to understand the well-being of older, community-dwelling Americans by examining the interactions among physical health and illness, medication use, cognitive function, emotional health, sensory function, health behaviors, social connectedness, sexuality, and relationship quality.
